hero.title: Join Our Partner Network
hero.description: Partner with us to expand your business opportunities and deliver enhanced value to your customers through our industry-leading solutions.

partnerTypes.title: Technology Partners
partnerTypes.description: Integrate our solutions with your technology stack and deliver enhanced value to your customers.

partnerTypes.title: Solution Partners
partnerTypes.description: Resell our solutions and provide implementation services to your customers.

benefits.title: Dedicated Support
benefits.description: Get access to dedicated partner support, training resources, and technical expertise.

benefits.title: Growth Opportunities
benefits.description: Expand your business with new revenue streams and market opportunities.

benefits.title: Industry Leadership
benefits.description: Partner with a recognized leader in security and infrastructure solutions.

cta.title: Ready to become a partner?
cta.description: Join our partner ecosystem and help shape the future of internet security and infrastructure.
